Title: Prohibits certain forensic child custody evaluators from appearing as an expert witness in family court
Summary: Prohibits forensic child custody evaluators who have been terminated for cause from appearing as an expert witness in family court custody and visitation proceedings.
LawCode: Amd §§70 & 240, Dom Rel L; amd §651, Fam Ct Act
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the domestic relations law and the family court act, in relation to prohibiting certain forensic child custody evaluators from appearing as an expert witness in family court
